source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [CurrencyAlternateKey] = C.CurrencyCode,
    [CurrencyName] = C.[Name]
FROM
    Sales.Currency C
ORDER BY
    C.[Name]

SELECT
	[CurrencyAlternateKey] = CS.CurrencyAlternateKey,
	[CurrencyName] = CS.CurrencyName
FROM
	Integration.CurrencyStaging CS LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimCurrency C ON
		C.CurrencyAlternateKey = CS.CurrencyAlternateKey
WHERE 
	C.CurrencyKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
	CS.CurrencyName

activities.name: Copy Fact Currency Rate Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    [CurrencyAlternateKey] = CR.ToCurrencyCode,
    [DateKey] = (
        (YEAR(CR.CurrencyRateDate) * 10000) +
        (MONTH(CR.CurrencyRateDate) * 100) + 
        DAY(CR.CurrencyRateDate)
    ),
    [AverageRate] = 1 / CR.AverageRate,
    [EndOfDayRate] = 1 / CR.EndOfDayRate,
    [Date] = CR.CurrencyRateDate
FROM 
    Sales.CurrencyRate CR 
ORDER BY
    CR.CurrencyRateDate,
    CR.ToCurrencyCode

dependsOn.activity: Copy Fact Currency Rate Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [CurrencyKey] = C.CurrencyKey,
    [DateKey] = FCRS.DateKey,
    [AverageRate] = FCRS.AverageRate,
    [EndOfDayRate] = FCRS.EndOfDayRate,
    [Date] = FCRS.Date	
FROM
    Integration.FactCurrencyRateStaging FCRS LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimCurrency C ON
        C.CurrencyAlternateKey = FCRS.CurrencyAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
    dbo.FactCurrencyRate FCR ON
        FCR.DateKey = FCRS.DateKey AND
        FCR.CurrencyKey = C.CurrencyKey
WHERE 
    FCR.CurrencyKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
    FCRS.Date,
    FCRS.CurrencyAlternateKey

activities.name: Copy Sales Reason Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[SalesReasonAlternateKey] = SR.SalesReasonID,
	[SalesReasonName] = SR.[Name],
	[SalesReasonReasonType] = SR.ReasonType
FROM 
	Sales.SalesReason SR
ORDER BY
	SR.SalesReasonID

dependsOn.activity: Copy Sales Reason Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	[SalesReasonAlternateKey] = SRS.SalesReasonAlternateKey,
	[SalesReasonName] = SRS.SalesReasonName,
	[SalesReasonReasonType] = SRS.SalesReasonReasonType
FROM
	Integration.SalesReasonStaging SRS LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimSalesReason SR ON
		SR.SalesReasonAlternateKey = SRS.SalesReasonAlternateKey
WHERE 
	SR.SalesReasonKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
	SRS.SalesReasonAlternateKey

SELECT
	[CustomerAlternateKey] = CAST(C.AccountNumber AS NVARCHAR(15)),
	[GeographyCity] = A.City,
	[GeographyPostalCode] = A.PostalCode,
	[GeographyStateProvinceCode] = CAST(SP.StateProvinceCode AS NVARCHAR(3)),
	[GeographyCountryRegionCode] = SP.CountryRegionCode,
	[Title] = P.Title,
	[FirstName] = P.FirstName,
	[MiddleName] = P.MiddleName,
	[LastName] = P.LastName,
	[NameStyle] = P.NameStyle,
	[BirthDate] = PD.BirthDate,
	[MaritalStatus] = PD.MaritalStatus,
	[Suffix] = P.Suffix,
	[Gender] = PD.Gender,
	[EmailAddress] = E.EmailAddress,
	[YearlyIncome] = 
		CASE
			WHEN CHARINDEX('-', PD.YearlyIncome, 0) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(PD.YearlyIncome, CHARINDEX('-', PD.YearlyIncome, 0) + 1, LEN(PD.YearlyIncome) - CHARINDEX('-', PD.YearlyIncome, 0))
			WHEN CHARINDEX('greater than', PD.YearlyIncome, 0) > 0 THEN REPLACE(PD.YearlyIncome, 'greater than', '')
			ELSE PD.YearlyIncome
		END,
	[TotalChildren] = PD.TotalChildren,
	[NumberChildrenAtHome] = PD.NumberChildrenAtHome,
	[EnglishEducation] = PD.Education,
	[SpanishEducation] = CAST(ET.SpanishName AS NVARCHAR(40)),
	[FrenchEducation] = CAST(ET.FrenchName AS NVARCHAR(40)),
	[EnglishOccupation] = PD.Occupation,
	[SpanishOccupation] = OT.SpanishName,
	[FrenchOccupation] = OT.FrenchName,
	[HouseOwnerFlag] = PD.HomeOwnerFlag,
	[NumberCarsOwned] = PD.NumberCarsOwned,
	[AddressLine1] = A.AddressLine1,
	[AddressLine2] = A.AddressLine2,
	[Phone] = CASt(PP.PhoneNumber AS NVARCHAR(20)),
	[DateFirstPurchase] = PD.DateFirstPurchase,
	[CommuteDistance] = PD.CommuteDistance
FROM 
	Sales.Customer C LEFT JOIN
	Person.Person P ON
		P.BusinessEntityID = C.PersonID LEFT JOIN
	Integration.PersonDemographics PD ON
		PD.BusinessEntityID = P.BusinessEntityID LEFT JOIN
	Person.EmailAddress E ON
		E.BusinessEntityID = P.BusinessEntityID LEFT JOIN
	Person.BusinessEntityAddress BEA ON
		BEA.BusinessEntityID = P.BusinessEntityID AND
		BEA.AddressTypeID = 2 LEFT JOIN
	Person.Address A ON
		A.AddressID = BEA.AddressID 
	CROSS APPLY
	(
		SELECT TOP 1
			PP.PhoneNumber
		FROM
			Person.PersonPhone PP 
		WHERE
			PP.BusinessEntityID = P.BusinessEntityID 
		ORDER BY
			PhoneNumberTypeID
	) PP LEFT JOIN
	Person.StateProvince SP ON
		SP.StateProvinceID = A.StateProvinceID LEFT JOIN
	Integration.EducationType ET ON 
		ET.Name = PD.Education LEFT JOIN
	Integration.OccupationType OT ON 
		OT.Name = PD.Occupation
WHERE
	C.PersonID IS NOT NULL AND 
	C.StoreID IS NULL
ORDER BY
	C.AccountNumber

SELECT
    [GeographyKey] = G.GeographyKey,
    [CustomerAlternateKey] = CS.CustomerAlternateKey,
    [Title] = CS.Title,
    [FirstName] = CS.FirstName,
    [MiddleName] = CS.MiddleName,
    [LastName] = CS.LastName,
    [NameStyle] = CS.NameStyle,
    [BirthDate] = CS.BirthDate,
    [MaritalStatus] = CS.MaritalStatus,
    [Suffix] = CS.Suffix,
    [Gender] = CS.Gender,
    [EmailAddress] = CS.EmailAddress,
    [YearlyIncome] = CS.YearlyIncome,
    [TotalChildren] = CS.TotalChildren,
    [NumberChildrenAtHome] = CS.NumberChildrenAtHome,
    [EnglishEducation] = CS.EnglishEducation,
    [SpanishEducation] = CS.SpanishEducation,
    [FrenchEducation] = CS.FrenchEducation,
    [EnglishOccupation] = CS.EnglishOccupation,
    [SpanishOccupation] = CS.SpanishOccupation,
    [FrenchOccupation] = CS.FrenchOccupation,
    [HouseOwnerFlag] = CS.HouseOwnerFlag,
    [NumberCarsOwned] = CS.NumberCarsOwned,
    [AddressLine1] = CS.AddressLine1,
    [AddressLine2] = CS.AddressLine2,
    [Phone] = CS.Phone,
    [DateFirstPurchase] = CS.DateFirstPurchase,
    [CommuteDistance] = CS.CommuteDistance
FROM
    Integration.CustomerStaging CS LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimGeography G ON
        G.City = CS.GeographyCity AND
        G.PostalCode = CS.GeographyPostalCode AND
        G.StateProvinceCode = CS.GeographyStateProvinceCode AND
        G.CountryRegionCode = CS.GeographyCountryRegionCode LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimCustomer C ON
        C.CustomerAlternateKey = CS.CustomerAlternateKey 
WHERE 
    C.CustomerKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
    CS.CustomerAlternateKey

activities.name: Copy Fact Internet Sales Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[ProductAlternateKey] = P.ProductNumber,
	[OrderDateKey] = (
		(YEAR(SOH.OrderDate) * 10000) +
		(MONTH(SOH.OrderDate) * 100) + 
		DAY(SOH.OrderDate)
	),
	[DueDateKey] = (
		(YEAR(SOH.DueDate) * 10000) +
		(MONTH(SOH.DueDate) * 100) + 
		DAY(SOH.DueDate)
	),
	[ShipDateKey] = (
		(YEAR(SOH.ShipDate) * 10000) +
		(MONTH(SOH.ShipDate) * 100) + 
		DAY(SOH.ShipDate)
	),
	[CustomerAlternateKey] = CAST(C.AccountNumber AS NVARCHAR(50)),
	[PromotionAlternateKey] = SOD.SpecialOfferID,
	[CurrencyAlternateKey] = ISNULL(CR.ToCurrencyCode, 'USD'),
	[SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] = SOH.TerritoryID,
	[SalesOrderNumber] = CAST(SOH.SalesOrderNumber AS NVARCHAR(20)),
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] = (
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
			PARTITION BY 
				SOD.SalesOrderID 
			ORDER BY 
				SOD.SalesOrderDetailID ASC
		)
	),
	[RevisionNumber] = SOH.RevisionNumber,
	[OrderQuantity] = SOD.OrderQty,
	[UnitPrice] = SOD.UnitPrice,
	[ExtendedAmount] = SOD.UnitPrice * SOD.OrderQty,
	[UnitPriceDiscountPct] = SOD.UnitPriceDiscount,
	[DiscountAmount] = (
		SOD.UnitPrice * 
		SOD.OrderQty *
		SOD.UnitPriceDiscount
	),
	[ProductStandardCost] = COALESCE(PCH.StandardCost, P.StandardCost),
	[TotalProductCost] = (
		COALESCE(PCH.StandardCost, P.StandardCost) *
		SOD.OrderQty
	),
	[SalesAmount] = SOD.LineTotal,
	[TaxAmt] = ROUND(
		(
			(SOD.LineTotal / SOH.SubTotal) * 
			SOH.TaxAmt
		),
		4
	),
	[Freight] = ROUND(
		(
			(SOD.LineTotal / SOH.SubTotal) * 
			SOH.Freight
		),
		4
	),
	[CarrierrTrackingNumber] = SOD.CarrierTrackingNumber,
	[CustomerPONumber] = SOH.PurchaseOrderNumber,
	[OrderDate] = SOH.OrderDate,
	[DueDate] = SOH.DueDate,
	[ShipDate] = SOH.ShipDate
FROM 
	Sales.Customer C LEFT JOIN
	Sales.SalesOrderHeader SOH ON 
		SOH.CustomerID = C.CustomerID LEFT JOIN
	Sales.SalesOrderDetail SOD ON
		SOD.SalesOrderID = SOH.SalesOrderID LEFT JOIN
	Production.[Product] P ON
		P.ProductID = SOD.ProductID LEFT JOIN
	Production.ProductCostHistory PCH ON 
		PCH.ProductID = SOD.ProductID 
		AND
		SOH.OrderDate >= PCH.StartDate AND 
		(
			SOH.OrderDate <= PCH.EndDate OR 
			PCH.EndDate IS NULL
		) 
		LEFT JOIN
	Sales.CurrencyRate CR ON
		CR.CurrencyRateID = SOH.CurrencyRateID 
WHERE
	C.PersonID IS NOT NULL AND
	C.StoreID IS NULL 
ORDER BY
	SOH.SalesOrderNumber,
	(
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
			PARTITION BY 
				SOD.SalesOrderID 
			ORDER BY 
				SOD.SalesOrderDetailID ASC
		)
	)

activities.name: Migrate Fact Internet Sales Staging Data

dependsOn.activity: Copy Fact Internet Sales Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	[ProductKey] = P.ProductKey,
	[OrderDateKey] = FISS.OrderDateKey,
	[DueDateKey] = FISS.DueDateKey,
	[ShipDateKey] = FISS.ShipDateKey,
	[CustomerKey] = C.CustomerKey,
	[PromotionKey] = PR.PromotionKey,
	[CurrencyKey] = CR.CurrencyKey,
	[SalesTerritoryKey] = ST.SalesTerritoryKey,
	[SalesOrderNumber] = FISS.SalesOrderNumber,
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] = FISS.SalesOrderLineNumber,
	[RevisionNumber] = FISS.RevisionNumber,
	[OrderQuantity] = FISS.OrderQuantity,
	[UnitPrice] = FISS.UnitPrice,
	[ExtendedAmount] = FISS.ExtendedAmount,
	[UnitPriceDiscountPct] = FISS.UnitPriceDiscountPct,
	[DiscountAmount] = FISS.DiscountAmount,
	[ProductStandardCost] = FISS.ProductStandardCost,
	[TotalProductCost] = FISS.TotalProductCost,
	[SalesAmount] = FISS.SalesAmount,
	[TaxAmt] = FISS.TaxAmt,
	[Freight] = FISS.Freight,
	[CarrierTrackingNumber] = FISS.CarrierTrackingNumber,
	[CustomerPONumber] = FISS.CustomerPONumber,
	[OrderDate] = FISS.OrderDate,
	[DueDate] = FISS.DueDate,
	[ShipDate] = FISS.ShipDate
FROM
	Integration.FactInternetSalesStaging FISS 
	CROSS APPLY
	(
		SELECT TOP 1
			P.ProductKey
		FROM	
			dbo.DimProduct P 
		WHERE
			P.ProductAlternateKey = FISS.ProductAlternateKey 
		ORDER BY
			P.Status DESC,
			P.StartDate DESC
	) P LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimCustomer C ON
		C.CustomerAlternateKey = FISS.CustomerAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimPromotion PR ON
		PR.PromotionAlternateKey = FISS.PromotionAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimCurrency CR ON
		CR.CurrencyAlternateKey = FISS.CurrencyAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimSalesTerritory ST ON
		ST.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey = FISS.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
	dbo.FactInternetSales FIS ON
		FIS.SalesOrderNumber = FISS.SalesOrderNumber AND
		FIS.SalesOrderLineNumber = FISS.SalesOrderLineNumber
WHERE 
	FIS.SalesOrderNumber IS NULL
ORDER BY
	FISS.SalesOrderNumber,
	FISS.SalesOrderLineNumber

activities.name: Copy Fact Internet Sales Reason Data to Staging

dependsOn.activity: Migrate Fact Internet Sales Staging Data

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [SalesOrderNumber] = CAST(SOH.SalesOrderNumber AS NVARCHAR(20)),
    [SalesOrderLineNumber] = SOH.SalesOrderLineNumber,
    [SalesReasonAlternateKey] = SOHSR.SalesReasonID
FROM
    Sales.SalesOrderHeaderSalesReason SOHSR 
    CROSS APPLY
    (
        SELECT
            [SalesOrderNumber] = SOH.SalesOrderNumber,
            [SalesOrderLineNumber] = (
                ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
                    PARTITION BY 
                        SOD.SalesOrderID 
                    ORDER BY 
                        SOD.SalesOrderDetailID ASC
                )
            )
        FROM
            Sales.SalesOrderHeader SOH JOIN
            Sales.SalesOrderDetail SOD ON
                SOD.SalesOrderID = SOH.SalesOrderID 
        WHERE
            SOH.SalesOrderID = SOHSR.SalesOrderID
    ) SOH
ORDER BY
    SOH.SalesOrderNumber,
    SOH.salesOrderLineNumber,
    SOHSR.SalesReasonID

activities.name: Migrate Fact Internet Sales Reason Staging Data

dependsOn.activity: Copy Fact Internet Sales Reason Data to Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	[SalesOrderNumber] = FISRS.SalesOrderNumber,
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] = FISRS.SalesOrderLineNumber,
	[SalesReasonKey] = SR.SalesReasonKey	
FROM
	Integration.FactInternetSalesReasonStaging FISRS LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimSalesReason SR ON
		SR.SalesReasonAlternateKey = FISRS.SalesReasonAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
	dbo.FactInternetSalesReason FISR ON
		FISR.SalesOrderNumber = FISRS.SalesOrderNumber AND
		FISR.SalesOrderLineNumber = FISRS.SalesOrderLineNumber
WHERE 
	FISR.SalesOrderNumber IS NULL
ORDER BY
	FISRS.SalesOrderNumber,
	FISRS.salesOrderLineNumber,
	FISRS.SalesReasonAlternateKey

activities.name: Migrate Sales Territory Data To Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] = ST.TerritoryID,
    [SalesTerrirtoryRegion] = ST.Name,
    [SalesTerritoryCountry] = CR.Name,
    [SalesTerritoryGroup] = ST.[Group]
FROM
    Sales.SalesTerritory ST LEFT JOIN
    Person.CountryRegion CR ON
        CR.CountryRegionCode = ST.CountryRegionCode
ORDER BY
    ST.TerritoryID

dependsOn.activity: Migrate Sales Territory Data To Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] = STS.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey,
    [SalesTerritoryRegion] = STS.SalesTerritoryRegion,
    [SalesTerritoryCountry] = STS.SalesTerritoryCountry,
    [SalesTerritoryGroup] = STS.SalesTerritoryGroup
FROM
    Integration.SalesTerritoryStaging STS LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimSalesTerritory ST ON
        ST.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey = STS.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey
WHERE 
    ST.SalesTerritoryKey IS NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT
    ST0.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey,
    ST0.SalesTerritoryRegion,
    ST0.SalesTerritoryCountry,
    ST0.SalesTerritoryGroup
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            [SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] = 0,
            [SalesTerritoryRegion] = 'NA',
            [SalesTerritoryCountry] = 'NA',
            [SalesTerritoryGroup] = 'NA'
    ) ST0 LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimSalesTerritory ST On
        ST.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey = ST0.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey
WHERE
    ST.SalesTerritoryKey IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT
	[City] = AD.City, 
	[StateProvinceCode] = SP.StateProvinceCode, 
	[StateProvinceName] = SP.Name,
	[CountryRegionCode] = SP.CountryRegionCode,
	[EnglishCountryRegionName] = CR.Name,
	[SpanishCountryRegionName] = ICR.SpanishCountryRegionName,
	[FrenchCountryRegionName] = ICR.FrenchCountryRegionName,
	[PostalCode] = AD.PostalCode,
	[SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] = SP.TerritoryID
FROM
	Person.Address AD LEFT JOIN
	Person.StateProvince SP ON
		SP.StateProvinceID = AD.StateProvinceID LEFT JOIN
	Person.CountryRegion CR ON
		CR.CountryRegionCode = SP.CountryRegionCode LEFT JOIN
	Integration.CountryRegion ICR ON
		ICR.CountryRegionName = CR.Name
ORDER BY
	CR.Name,
	SP.Name,
	AD.City,
	AD.PostalCode

SELECT
    [City] = GS.City,
    [StateProvinceCode] = GS.StateProvinceCode,
    [StateProvinceName] = GS.StateProvinceName,
    [CountryRegionCode] = GS.CountryRegionCode,
    [EnglishCountryRegionName] = GS.EnglishCountryRegionName,
    [SpanishCountryRegionName] = GS.SpanishCountryRegionName,
    [FrenchCountryRegionName] = GS.FrenchCountryRegionName,
    [PostalCode] = GS.PostalCode,
    [SalesTerritoryKey] = ST.SalesTerritoryKey
FROM
    Integration.GeographyStaging GS LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimSalesTerritory ST ON
        ST.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey = GS.SalesTerritoryAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimGeography G ON
        G.City = GS.City AND
        G.PostalCode = GS.PostalCode AND
        G.StateProvinceCode = GS.StateProvinceCode AND
        G.CountryRegionCode = GS.CountryRegionCode 
WHERE 
    G.GeographyKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
    GS.EnglishCountryRegionName,
    GS.StateProvinceName,
    GS.City,
    GS.PostalCode

activities.name: Copy Product Category Data To Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [ProductCategoryAlternateKey] = PC.ProductCategoryID,
    [EnglishProductCategoryName] = PC.Name,
    [SpanishProductCategoryName] = PCT.SpanishName,
    [FrenchProductCategoryName] = PCT.FrenchName
FROM
    Production.ProductCategory PC LEFT JOIN
    Integration.ProductCategoryType PCT ON
        PCT.Name = PC.Name
ORDER BY
    PC.ProductCategoryID

dependsOn.activity: Copy Product Category Data To Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	PSD.ProductCategoryAlternateKey,
	PSD.EnglishProductCategoryName,
	PSD.SpanishProductCategoryName,
	PSD.FrenchProductCategoryName
FROM 
	Integration.ProductCategoryStaging PSD LEFT JOIN
	dbo.DimProductCategory PD ON 
		PD.ProductCategoryAlternateKey = PSD.ProductCategoryAlternateKey
WHERE
	PD.ProductCategoryAlternateKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
	PSD.ProductCategoryAlternateKey

activities.name: Copy Product Sub Category Data To Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey] = PSC.ProductSubcategoryID,
    [EnglishProductSubcategoryName] = PSC.Name,
    [SpanishProductSubcategoryName] = PSCT.SpanishName,
    [FrenchProductSubcategoryName] = PSCT.FrenchName,
    [ProductCategoryAlternateKey] = PSC.ProductCategoryID
FROM
    Production.ProductSubcategory PSC LEFT JOIN
    Integration.ProductSubcategoryType PSCT ON
        PSCT.Name = PSC.Name
ORDER BY
    PSC.ProductSubcategoryID

activities.name: Migrate Product Sub Category Staging Data

dependsOn.activity: Copy Product Sub Category Data To Staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    [ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey] = PST.ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey,
    [EnglishProductSubcategoryName] = PST.EnglishProductSubcategoryName,
    [SpanishProductSubcategoryName] = PST.SpanishProductSubcategoryName,
    [FrenchProductSubcategoryName] = PST.FrenchProductSubcategoryName,
    [ProductCategoryKey] = PC.ProductCategoryKey
FROM
    Integration.ProductSubcategoryStaging PST LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimProductCategory PC ON
        PC.ProductCategoryAlternateKey = PST.ProductCategoryAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimProductSubcategory PS ON
        PS.ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey = PST.ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey
WHERE
    PS.ProductSubcategoryKey IS NULL

dependsOn.activity: Migrate Product Sub Category Staging Data

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    [ProductAlternateKey] = P.ProductNumber,
    [ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey] = P.ProductSubcategoryID,
    [WeightUnitMeasureCode] = P.WeightUnitMeasureCode,
    [SizeUnitMeasureCode] = P.SizeUnitMeasureCode,
    [EnglishProductName] = P.[Name],
    [SpanishProductName] = PNT.SpanishName,
    [FrenchProductName] = PNT.FrenchName,
    [StandardCost] = 
        CASE 
            WHEN PCH.StartDate IS NOT NULL THEN PCH.StandardCost
            ELSE P.StandardCost
        END,
    [FinishedGoodsFlag] = P.FinishedGoodsFlag,
    [Color] = ISNULL(P.Color, 'NA'),
    [SafetyStockLevel] = P.SafetyStockLevel,
    [ReorderPoint] = P.ReorderPoint,
    [ListPrice] = 
        CASE
            WHEN PLPH.StartDate IS NOT NULL THEN PLPH.ListPrice
            ELSE P.ListPrice
        END,
    [Size] = P.Size,
    [SizeRange] = ISNULL(SRT.SizeRange, 'NA'),
    [Weight] = P.[Weight],
    [DaysToManufacture] = P.DaysToManufacture,
    [ProductLine] = P.ProductLine,
    [DealerPrice] = NULL,
    [Class] = P.Class,
    [Style] = P.Style,
    [ModelName] = PM.Name,
    [LargePhoto] = PP.LargePhoto,
    [EnglishDescription] = PD.Description,
    [FrenchDescription] = PD2.Description,
    [ChineseDescription] = PD3.Description,
    [ArabicDescription] = PD4.Description,
    [HebrewDescription] = PD5.Description,
    [ThaiDescription] = PD6.Description,
    [GermanDescription] = PDT.GermanDescription,
    [JapaneseDescription] = PDT.JapaneseDescription,
    [TurkishDescription] = PDT.TurkishDescription,
    [StartDate] = PCH.StartDate,
    [EndDate] = PCH.EndDate,
    [Status] = CAST(
        CASE 
            WHEN PLPH.EndDate IS NULL THEN 'Current'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS NVARCHAR(7)
    )
FROM 
    Production.[Product] P LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductListPriceHistory PLPH ON
        PLPH.ProductID = P.ProductID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductCostHistory PCH ON
        PCH.ProductID = P.ProductID AND
        PLPH.StartDate = PCH.StartDate LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductModel PM ON
        PM.ProductModelID = P.ProductModelID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductProductPhoto PPP ON
        PPP.ProductID = P.ProductID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductPhoto PP ON
        PP.ProductPhotoID = PPP.ProductPhotoID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture PMDC ON
        PMDC.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID AND
        PMDC.CultureID = 'en' LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductDescription PD ON
        PD.ProductDescriptionID = PMDC.ProductDescriptionID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture PMDC2 ON
        PMDC2.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID AND
        PMDC2.CultureID = 'fr' LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductDescription PD2 ON
        PD2.ProductDescriptionID = PMDC2.ProductDescriptionID LEFT JOIN 
    Production.ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture PMDC3 ON
        PMDC3.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID AND
        PMDC3.CultureID = 'zh-cht' LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductDescription PD3 ON
        PD3.ProductDescriptionID = PMDC3.ProductDescriptionID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture PMDC4 ON
        PMDC4.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID AND
        PMDC4.CultureID = 'ar' LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductDescription PD4 ON
        PD4.ProductDescriptionID = PMDC4.ProductDescriptionID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture PMDC5 ON
        PMDC5.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID AND
        PMDC5.CultureID = 'he' LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductDescription PD5 ON
        PD5.ProductDescriptionID = PMDC5.ProductDescriptionID LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture PMDC6 ON
        PMDC6.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID AND
        PMDC6.CultureID = 'th' LEFT JOIN
    Production.ProductDescription PD6 ON
        PD6.ProductDescriptionID = PMDC6.ProductDescriptionID LEFT JOIN
    Integration.ProductDescriptionType PDT ON
        PDT.Description = PD.Description LEFT JOIN
    Integration.ProductNameType PNT ON
        PNT.Name = P.Name LEFT JOIN
    Integration.SizeRangeType SRT ON 
        SRT.Size = P.Size
ORDER BY
    P.ProductID

SELECT
    [ProductAlternateKey] = PS.ProductAlternateKey,
    [ProductSubcategoryKey] = PSC.ProductSubcategoryKey,
    [WeightUnitMeasureCode] = PS.WeightUnitMeasureCode,
    [SizeUnitMeasureCode] = PS.SizeUnitMeasureCode,
    [EnglishProductName] = PS.EnglishProductName,
    [SpanishProductName] = PS.SpanishProductName,
    [FrenchProductName] = PS.FrenchProductName,
    [StandardCost] = PS.StandardCost,
    [FinishedGoodsFlag] = PS.FinishedGoodsFlag,
    [Color] = PS.Color,
    [SafetyStockLevel] = PS.SafetyStockLevel,
    [ReorderPoint] = PS.ReorderPoint,
    [ListPrice] = PS.ListPrice,
    [Size] = PS.Size,
    [SizeRange] = PS.SizeRange,
    [Weight] = PS.Weight,
    [DaysToManufacture] = PS.DaysToManufacture,
    [ProductLine] = PS.ProductLine,
    [DealerPrice] = PS.DealerPrice,
    [Class] = PS.Class,
    [Style] = PS.Style,
    [ModelName] = PS.ModelName,
    [LargePhoto] = PS.LargePhoto,
    [EnglishDescription] = PS.EnglishDescription,
    [FrenchDescription] = PS.FrenchDescription,
    [ChineseDescription] = PS.ChineseDescription,
    [ArabicDescription] = PS.ArabicDescription,
    [HebrewDescription] = PS.HebrewDescription,
    [ThaiDescription] = PS.ThaiDescription,
    [GermanDescription] = PS.GermanDescription,
    [JapaneseDescription] = PS.JapaneseDescription,
    [TurkishDescription] = PS.TurkishDescription,
    [StartDate] = PS.StartDate,
    [EndDate] = PS.EndDate,
    [Status] = PS.Status
FROM
    Integration.ProductStaging PS LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimProductSubcategory PSC ON
        PSC.ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey = PS.ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimProduct P ON
        P.ProductAlternateKey = PS.ProductAlternateKey
WHERE 
    P.ProductKey IS NULL

SELECT
	[PromotionAlternateKey] = SO.SpecialOfferID,
	[EnglishPromotionName] = SO.[Description],
	[SpanishPromotionName] = PNT.[SpanishName],
	[FrenchPromotionName] = PNT.[FrenchName],
	[DiscountPct] = SO.DiscountPct,
	[EnglishPromotionType] = SO.[Type],
	[SpanishPromotionType] = PT.[SpanishName],
	[FrenchPromotionType] = PT.[FrenchName],
	[EnglishPromotionCategory] = SO.Category,
	[SpanishPromotionCategory] = PCT.SpanishName,
	[FrenchPromotionCategory] = PCT.FrenchName,
	[StartDate] = SO.StartDate,
	[EndDate] = SO.EndDate,
	[MinQty] = SO.MinQty,
	[MaxQty] = SO.MaxQty
FROM
	Sales.SpecialOffer SO LEFT JOIN
	Integration.PromotionNameType PNT ON
		PNT.Name = SO.Description LEFT JOIN
	Integration.PromotionType PT ON
		PT.Name = SO.Type LEFT JOIN
	Integration.PromotionCategoryType PCT ON
		PCT.Name = SO.Category
ORDER BY
	SO.SpecialOfferID

SELECT
    [PromotionAlternateKey] = PS.PromotionAlternateKey,
    [EnglishPromotionName] = PS.EnglishPromotionName,
    [SpanishPromotionName] = PS.SpanishPromotionName,
    [FrenchPromotionName] = PS.FrenchPromotionName,
    [DiscountPct] = PS.DiscountPct,
    [EnglishPromotionType] = PS.EnglishPromotionType,
    [SpanishPromotionType] = PS.SpanishPromotionType,
    [FrenchPromotionType] = PS.FrenchPromotionType,
    [EnglishPromotionCategory] = PS.EnglishPromotionCategory,
    [SpanishPromotionCategory] = PS.SpanishPromotionCategory,
    [FrenchPromotionCategory] = PS.FrenchPromotionCategory,
    [StartDate] = PS.StartDate,
    [EndDate] = PS.EndDate,
    [MinQty] = PS.MinQty,
    [MaxQty] = PS.MaxQty
FROM
    Integration.PromotionStaging PS LEFT JOIN
    dbo.DimPromotion P ON
        P.PromotionAlternateKey = PS.PromotionAlternateKey
WHERE 
    P.PromotionKey IS NULL
ORDER BY
    PS.PromotionAlternateKey
